meanings.sent1: She rejoined with a quick response.

meanings.definition: To come together again after being apart.
meanings.sent1: The friends rejoined at the park after a long time.
meanings.sent2: The broken pieces of the vase rejoined perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The two rivers rejoined downstream, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent4: The team rejoined for a celebratory dinner after their victory.
meanings.sent5: The family finally rejoined after a year of being separated.
